title: Steady hands or missed chance? Pérez and Bottas to drive for Cadillac’s F1 team
summary: As Cadillac prepares to enter F1 in 2026, it will pair Sergio Pérez and Valtteri Bottas in its cars. Are they the right choice to lead the ambitious new team's charge?
